briefTitle: Deep Inspiration Breath-hold Radiotherapy for Left-sided Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Deep Inspiration Breath-hold Radiotherapy for Left-sided Breast Cancer in Reducing Early Cardiac Injury: a Phase II Prospective Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence of clinical or subclinical cardiac injury
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Primary left-sided breast cancer post surgery
* Planning for adjuvant breast/chest wall +-RNI

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of cardiovascular disease
* Previous chest radiation
* Bilateral breast cancers
